Learning_Page_ItemObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Learning_Page_ItemObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Learning_Page_ItemObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Identifies learning page items using unique references for updates. Leave blank when creating a learning page item.

description: Contains detailed data about the learning page item.

validation.validation: You can't update the page with this page item. Select a different page item.
You can’t add this page content to this page. Select a different page content.
This page content is unavailable for extended enterprise learners. To access the content, update your security permissions.
You can add page contents once for each page. To proceed, remove any duplicates.
You can add up to 3 spotlight cards.
Only include security groups that are configured on the Learning Access domain.
You can only configure security groups on delivered sliders. Select a delivered slider to configure a security group.
Add 1 or more security groups for delivered sliders.
You can add up to 3 custom sliders.
